post.author: Admin
post.title: Sign Up Genius to Help at the Banquet
post.description: Dear Band Families, Next Wednesday, May 2nd, will be our Spring Band/Dinner Banquet.  By now yo
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

Next Wednesday, May 2nd, will be our Spring Band/Dinner Banquet.  By now you should have received an invite for this evening along with an RSVP if you are planning on attending the dinner.  We are in need of volunteers to help us set up, serve and clean up for this event.  Keep in mind we will not clean up until after the awards ceremony, so you will not miss any of the program.  The link for signing up to help with this event is as follows:  www.signupgenius.com/go/5080944a5ae2fa4ff2-2018.

Please consider helping with this event.  We appreciate any and all volunteers.

Have a nice day,

NR Band Boosters Hospitality Committee
